data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade de la Beaujoire have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Nantes.
In the minute 1, Clement Turpin signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Nantes's half.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
In the minute 3, Ludovic Blas (Nantes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Nantes.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Strasbourg drives forward and Kenny Lala gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 11, Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Strasbourg are coming forward and Habib Diallo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Can Nantes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 14, Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Nantes.
Penalty! Clement Turpin points to the spot, great chance for Strasbourg...
Goal! Dimitri Lienard gives Strasbourg a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Strasbourg.
Clement Turpin awards the away team a throw-in.
Clement Turpin signals a Nantes throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 21, Nantes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 23, In Nantes, Abdoulaye Toure of Nantes is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Strasbourg defence as Nicolas Pallois fires in a strike for Nantes.
In the minute 25, In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Strasbourg are caught offside.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Nantes.
Nantes needs to be cautious. Strasbourg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 29, Clement Turpin awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Free kick Nantes.
Dimitri Lienard (Strasbourg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg move into a more comfortable 0-2 lead. Habib Diallo is the scorer with a header!
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 37, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Free kick Nantes.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Strasbourg.
Throw-in Nantes.
Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 41, In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Strasbourg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Clement Turpin will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Stade de la Beaujoire.
The second-half is underway at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Beaujoire.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Clement Turpin signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Nantes's half.
In the minute 50, Strasbourg's Mehdi Chahiri breaks free at Stade de la Beaujoire. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Clement Turpin awards Nantes a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 51, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Nantes.
Sebastien Corchia (Nantes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
In the minute 53, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
In the minute 56, Clement Turpin awards the home team a throw-in.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Ludovic Ajorque of Strasbourg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Strasbourg.
Christian Gourcuff is making the team's first substitution at Stade de la Beaujoire with Imran Louza replacing Abdoulaye Toure.
Kenny Lala (Strasbourg) has received a first yellow card.
Adrien Thomasson of Strasbourg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nantes.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 64, Mehdi Abeid (Nantes) has received a yellow card from Clement Turpin.
Nantes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 67, In Nantes Strasbourg drive forward through Kenny Lala. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nantes drive upfield and Ludovic Blas gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Strasbourg defender.
Ludovic Blas for Nantes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Imran Louza for Nantes has been booked by Clement Turpin and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in Nantes.
In the minute 69, Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
In the minute 71, Clement Turpin signals a Nantes throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Nantes have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 74, Strasbourg have a goal kick.
Marcus Coco is replacing Abdoul Kader Bamba for the home team.
Lucien Kevin Zohi is replacing Mehdi Chahiri for Strasbourg at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 76, Strasbourg have been awarded a penalty in Nantes...
Sebastien Corchia (Nantes) gets a yellow card.
Nantes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 78, Goal! The away team extend their lead to 0-3 thanks to a penalty from Ludovic Ajorque.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade de la Beaujoire.
In the minute 81, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Bridge Ndilu is on a sub for Moses Simon for Nantes.
In the minute 82, The home team have replaced Mehdi Abeid with Pedro Chirivella. This is the fourth substitution made today by Christian Gourcuff.
Lucien Kevin Zohi puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-4.
That's a fine assist from Ludovic Ajorque.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Habib Diallo with Ismael Aaneba.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Strasbourg.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a third substitution, with Sanjin Prcic replacing Dimitri Lienard.
In the minute 86, Free kick Nantes.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Strasbourg make their fourth substitution with Lionel Carole replacing Anthony Caci.
In the minute 88, The away team have replaced Adrien Thomasson with Mahame Siby. This is the fifth substitution made today by Thierry Laurey.
In Nantes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Clement Turpin awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nantes.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-4.
